cop.title: |m3:A Pi'almoc |m|g ;e;pjwk ;ebol ;ejen nens/ri ;nKore euka]
items:
Oumakarioc pe pirwmi ete ;mpefse qen ;pco[ni ;nte niaceb/c oude
;mpef;ohi ;eratf hi ;vmwit ;nte nirefernobi

oude ;mpefhemci hi ;tkayedra ;nte niloimoc. Alla ;ere pefouws swpi
qen ;vnomoc ;mP[oic ef;eermeletan qen pefnomoc ;;mpi;ehoou nem piejwrh.

Ouoh ef;eer ;m;vr/] ;mpi;ss/n etr/t qaten nifoi ;mmwou: v/ eyna]
;mpefoutah qen ;pc/ou ;nt/if.

Pair/] an niaceb/c: pair/] an:
Alla ;m;vr/] ;mpir/ici ;esare ;py/ou ;nehf ;ebol hijen ;pho ;m;pkahi.

Eybe vai ;nne niaceb/c twounou
qen ];kricic oude nirefernobi qen ;pco[ni ;nte ni;ym/i.

Je P[oic cwoun ;m;vmwit ;nte
ni;ym/i ouoh ;vmwit ;nte niaceb/c ;fnatako.
